data.system_settings: Windows 10 Pro x64 v1803 Firefox Nightly v63.0a1
data.expected_result: The error message should say "Invalid callback"
data.short_description: [Website Bug] Improper message on submitting an invalid OAuth2 callback
data.steps_to_repro: - Go to an application - Go to OAuth2 - Enter an invalid callback and press save changes
